name: Viroids
description:
You and your ship have been shrunk down to the size of a medical nano-bot in order to break apart viruses and clear infections for as long as you can. 

 

Power-ups appear in the form of red pills, that can improve the destructive power of your bot, or blue spheres that can recharge your shields.

An online leaderboard table allows you to compete against your friends and the rest of the world for the top spot.

Play with mouse and keyboard, or using a game controller.

Credits:

  • Game written by Arlorean and Carodan.
  • Plassion Leaderboards server courtesy of Rogerup.
  • Icons from Icons8 Color theme, modified to add keys and thumbstick arrows.
  • Distortion effects by Andrewgotow.
  • DOTween by demigiant for animation tweening.
